c74object.name: packback
c74object.digest: Pack back the output of coll
c74object.description:
packback
receives the data contents of coll in its left inlet and the numerical or symbolic index in its right inlet creating a list starting with the index. If the argument is 1, backpack prepends the store message before the symbolic index.

objarg.name: flag
objarg.description:
If the argument set to 1,
packback
prepends the store message before a symbolic index

method.name: anything
method.description: In left inlet: Content to be stored.

method.name: (inlet1)
method.description: In right inlet: Numerical or symbolic index.

entry.name: list
entry.description: Content prepended by numerical or symbolic index.
